charinfo.name: Yamashiro Aoba
charinfo.description: A Konoha jounin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Aoba while reserved in public, is more than willing to boast and brag in private. While a man of many talents, Aoba specializes in genjutsu that takes on the form of crows, being able to use them for all manner of purposes.

abilities.name: Scattering Thousand Crows Technique
abilities.description: Aoba summons a massive amount of crows, dealing 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, Aoba and his team will have 5 points of damage reduction. This skill can stack.

abilities.name: Revenge Of The Murder
abilities.description: For 3 turns, if one ally is killed, they will have their health set to 5, will have all their skills replaced by 'Convergence of a Murder' and will ignore all further skills. At the end of their next turn, that ally will die; this effect cannot be stopped, ignored or removed. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Convergence Of A Murder
abilities.description: Aoba commands his crows to pick off one enemy, dealing 45 damage to them. This skill will deal an additional 5 damage for each active 'Scattering Thousand Crows Technique' on the target.

abilities.name: Crow Shield
abilities.description: This skill makes Yamashiro Aoba invulnerable for 1 turn.
